pkgmetadata.longdescription: pydiffx - Python Reader/Writer for DiffX Files==============================================pydiffx is a Python implementation of the `DiffX specification<https://diffx.org/spec/index.html>`_.DiffX is a proposed specification for a structured version of Unified Diffsthat contains metadata, standardized parsing, multi-commit diffs, and binarydiffs, in a format compatible with existing diff parsers. `Learn more<https://diffx.org>`_.This module is a reference implementation designed to make it easy to read andwrite DiffX files in any Python application.Compatibility=============* Python 2.7* Python 3.6* Python 3.7* Python 3.8* Python 3.9* Python 3.10* Python 3.11Installation============pydiffx can be installed using ``pip``:: pip install -U pydiffxUsing pydiffx=============See the `documentation <https://diffx.org/pydiffx/>`_ for tutorials andcode references.
